text: Kill Her Gently is a 1957 British thriller movie. It was directed by Charles Saunders. Actors include Griffith Jones, Maureen Connell, Marc Lawrence, George Mikell, Roger Avon, and Shay Gorman. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 thriller movies Category:British thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Saunders Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in England
title: Kill Her Gently
